text: Platte City is a city in Platte County, Missouri within the United States. The population was 4,784 at the 2020 census. It is the county seat of Platte County. The city is part of the Kansas City metropolitan area. == References == == Other websites == * Platte City * Historic maps of Platte City in the Sanborn Maps of Missouri Collection at the University of Missouri Category:1840s establishments in Missouri Category:1843 establishments in the United States Category:Cities in Missouri Category:County seats in Missouri
title: Platte City, Missouri
